attributes.action: Close all Bars and ban the consumption of alcohol in the Houses of Parliament
attributes.additional_details: As a workplace it is not a suitable environment for alcohol to be served 24/7 no other workplace is permitted to serve alcohol indeed if you consume alcohol in most workplaces you would be disciplined and face dismissal.
attributes.background: Due to the toxic environment of sexual abuse bullying and abuse of power in the Houses of Parliament I ask you to sign this petition to call for an outright ban on alcohol being served in the Houses of Parliament as a workplace it should not be an environment where alcohol is served 24/7.
